mapper.select: select company.name as companyName,company_product.name as brandName ,company.id as companyId,company_product.detail from company LEFT JOIN company_product on company.id=company_product.company_id where company.competition_id=#{0} and company_product.quarter=#{1}

select company.name as companyName,company_product.name as brandName ,company.id as companyId,company_product.detail from company LEFT JOIN company_product on company.id=company_product.company_id where company.competition_id=#{comId} and company.name=#{comName}

select ca.company_id as companyId,ca.product_id as productId,ca.product_name as productName, ca.advertise_name as adName,ca.advertise_id as adId from company_advertise ca where company_id=#{comId} and quarter=#{quarter}

select id,quarter,company_id as companyId,product_id as productId,product_name as productName ,advertise_name as advertiseName,advertise_id as advertiseId from company_advertise where product_id=#{proId} and advertise_name=#{adName}
select company_id as companyId,product_id as productId,sale from product_market_share where company_id=#{0} and quarter=#{1}
select company_id as companyId,product_id as productId,product_type as productType,need,market_share as marketShare,sale from product_market_share where competition_id=#{0} and quarter=#{1}
select pp.company_id as companyId,pp.product_id as productId,pp.price,pp.youji from product_price pp left join company c on c.id=pp.company_id where c.competition_id=#{0} and pp.quarter=#{1}

select ca.company_id as companyId,ca.product_id as productId,ca.product_name as productName,ca.advertise_id as advertiseId from company_advertise ca LEFT JOIN company c on c.id=ca.company_id where c.competition_id=#{0} and ca.quarter=#{1}
